songs.name: Yara teri yari ko song
songs.chords:
[G]  tere jaisa yaar ka [Bm] han

[D] kahan aisa yaa [G] rana

[G] yaad karegi dun [Bm] iya

[D] tera mera af [G] sana

[G]   meri zindagi sawaari

[G] mujhko gale lagake

[C] baitha diya falak pe

[D] mujhe khaat se [G] oothake

[G] yaara teri yaari [Bm] ko

[D] maine to khuda [G] mana

[G] yaad karegi dun [Bm] iya

[D] tera mera af [G] sana

[G] mere dil ki yeh dua hai

[G] kabhi door tu na jaaye

[C] tere bina ho jeena

[D] woh din kabhi na [G] aaye

[G] tere sung jeena ya [Bm] han

[D] tere sung mar [G] jaana

[G] yaad karegi dun [Bm] iya

[D] tera mera af [G] sana

[G]  tere jaisa yaar ka [Bm] han

[D] kahan aisa yaa [G] rana
 Thankyou!!!

songs.tabs:
Intro

E|——————————————————-3-3——————–
B|———-4-6-6————-4-6-6———–4—————6–4———-
G|-3-5—————-3-5—————-5——————————-5—

You know I try but I don’t do too well with apologies

I know you know that I made those mistakes maybe once or twice
